00018 /* all platform-specific ifdefs should go here */
00019 
00020 #ifndef _PLATFORM_HACKS_H_
00021 #define _PLATFORM_HACKS_H_
00022 
00023 #ifdef __GNUC__
00024 #define MONGO_INLINE static __inline__
00025 #else
00026 #define MONGO_INLINE static
00027 #endif
00028 
00029 #ifdef __cplusplus
00030 #define MONGO_EXTERN_C_START extern "C" {
00031 #define MONGO_EXTERN_C_END }
00032 #else
00033 #define MONGO_EXTERN_C_START
00034 #define MONGO_EXTERN_C_END
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 
00038 #if defined(MONGO_HAVE_STDINT) || __STDC_VERSION__ >= 199901L
00039 #include <stdint.h>
00040 #elif defined(MONGO_HAVE_UNISTD)
00041 #include <unistd.h>
00042 #elif defined(MONGO_USE__INT64)
00043 typedef __int64 int64_t;
00044 typedef unsigned __int64 uint64_t;
00045 #elif defined(MONGO_USE_LONG_LONG_INT)
00046 typedef long long int int64_t;
00047 typedef unsigned long long int uint64_t;
00048 #else
00049 #error must have a 64bit int type
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 /* big endian is only used for OID generation. little is used everywhere else */
00053 #ifdef MONGO_BIG_ENDIAN
00054 #define bson_little_endian64(out, in) ( bson_swap_endian64(out, in) )
00055 #define bson_little_endian32(out, in) ( bson_swap_endian32(out, in) )
00056 #define bson_big_endian64(out, in) ( memcpy(out, in, 8) )
00057 #define bson_big_endian32(out, in) ( memcpy(out, in, 4) )
00058 #else
00059 #define bson_little_endian64(out, in) ( memcpy(out, in, 8) )
00060 #define bson_little_endian32(out, in) ( memcpy(out, in, 4) )
00061 #define bson_big_endian64(out, in) ( bson_swap_endian64(out, in) )
00062 #define bson_big_endian32(out, in) ( bson_swap_endian32(out, in) )
00063 #endif
00064 
00065 MONGO_EXTERN_C_START
00066 
00067 MONGO_INLINE void bson_swap_endian64(void* outp, const void* inp){
00068     const char *in = (const char*)inp;
00069     char *out = (char*)outp;
00070 
00071     out[0] = in[7];
00072     out[1] = in[6];
00073     out[2] = in[5];
00074     out[3] = in[4];
00075     out[4] = in[3];
00076     out[5] = in[2];
00077     out[6] = in[1];
00078     out[7] = in[0];
00079 
00080 }
00081 MONGO_INLINE void bson_swap_endian32(void* outp, const void* inp){
00082     const char *in = (const char*)inp;
00083     char *out = (char*)outp;
00084 
00085     out[0] = in[3];
00086     out[1] = in[2];
00087     out[2] = in[1];
00088     out[3] = in[0];
00089 }
00090 
00091 MONGO_EXTERN_C_END
00092 
00093 #endif
